text: Paul Wine is an American chemist currently at Georgia Tech and an Elected Fellow of the American Association for the Advancement of Science and American Chemical Society. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Fellows of the American Association for the Advancement of Science Category:21st-century American chemists Category:Fellows of the American Chemical Society Category:Georgia Tech faculty Category:University of Michigan alumni Category:Florida State University alumni
title: Paul Wine
